title: Messengers of peace
creator_credit: United Nations Television and Frank Jacobs
brief_description: This film looks at the philatelic aspects of United Nations’ stamps. The U.N. has a postal administration and used the mail routes of the world for its own unique international postage stamps. Some of the world’s leading artists prepare the designs, which appear on the stamps.
description: This film looks at the philatelic aspects of United Nations’ stamps. The U.N. has a postal administration and used the mail routes of the world for its own unique international postage stamps. Some of the world’s leading artists prepare the designs, which appear on the stamps.

The U.N. has a postal administration and used the mail routes of the world for its own unique international postage stamps. Some of the world’s leading artists prepare the designs, which appear on the stamps.
